heading: Aspect of Metamorphic Stone â€“ Diablo 4 Druid Legendary Aspect
content: Aspect of Metamorphic Stone is a Druid Offensive Aspect that can only be found from random drops. Unlike Codex Aspects you can't go run a Dungeon to unlock this and will have to rely on RNG. Legendary Aspects can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. no longer has a cooldown.

heading: Table of Contents
